謵字的基本解释

謵
xí
用言语威吓：“夫复謵不餽而忘人。”

謵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xí］
［《集韻》席入切，入緝，邪。］
用言语使惧怕。

謵字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謵； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1178第13
【集韻】席入切，音習。【說文】言謵讋也。　又與習同。【莊子·庚桑楚】夫復謵不餽而忘人，忘人因以爲天人矣。【註】猶服習也。　又【廣韻】叱涉切【集韻】尺涉切，?襜入聲。謵讋，言不正也。又小語也。　又【玉篇】丑涉切【集韻】勑涉切，?音鍤。義同。

謵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
謵字的起名意思

用言语使惧怕。

謵
Basic explanation of words
謵
xí
Intimidate with words: "The husband will forget the others without giving feedback."
謵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xí］
["Ji Yun" Xi enters the cut, enters the arrest, evil. ]
Use words to make you afraid.
謵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謵; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1178 13
【Ji Yun】I enter the cut and learn the sound. [Speaking] Words are eloquent.　 Same with Xi again. [Zhuangzi·Geng Sangchu] The husband forgets others without giving feedback. [Note] Still obedient.　[Guang Yun] Chi She-cut [Ji Yun] Ruler She-cut, and enter the sound. Hey, it's not correct. It's a small word.　[Jade Chapter] Ugly She-cut [Ji Yun] She-cut,? Yin 锸. The same meaning.
